data.eml:eml: Parasitoids of the Australian citrus whitefly, Orchamoplatus citri (Takahashi) (Hemiptera, Aleyrodidae), with description of a new Eretmocerus species (Hymenoptera, Aphelinidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Schmidt, Stefan, Barro, Paul De, Jamieson, Lisa (2011): Parasitoids of the Australian citrus whitefly, Orchamoplatus citri (Takahashi) (Hemiptera, Aleyrodidae), with description of a new Eretmocerus species (Hymenoptera, Aphelinidae). Zootaxa 2873: 27-34, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.200545
